content: please note that this is a crochet pattern only pdf file not the finished product this petite series is free pattern designed by woolly doodly approximate size 14 cm difficulty level beginner yarn dark brown beige red green yellow white crochet hook 3 00mm or 5/0 other materials needed to create petite owl yarn needle scissors safety eyes fiberfill / polyfil i would love to see the pictures of your finished creation please do share your gorgeous work and tag me on instagram @woolly doodly if you have any question about the pattern simply dm me on instagram and i ll be happy to guide you happy crocheting
